Item.name: Harpoon Gun Mark 2
Item.description: Fires harpoons at a faster rate also easier to fire accurately

Item.name: Shotgun Slug Shell
Item.description: Leaves a massive bullet hole with one big pellet but at the cost of bleeding

Item.name: Shotgun Rubber-Slug Shell
Item.description: Used for croud control or as a cheap alternative to actual rounds

Item.name: Revolver Bull Round
Item.description: Packs more of a punch but sacrifices pentration power.

Item.name: Shotgun Buckshot Shell
Item.description: Fires multiple pellets which allows for more bleeindg but less general damage

Item.name: Reflex Scatter Shell
Item.description: Fires multiple pellets which allows for more bleeindg but less general damage

Item.name: Reflex Slug Shell
Item.description: Fires multiple pellets which allows for more bleeindg but less general damage

Item.name: Plasma Torcher
Item.description: A modified plasma cutter that uses an unstable jet of ionized gas as a crude form of flamethrower.

Item.name: Restraint Set
Item.description: This is a set of four shackles and a hood designed to restrain highly dangerous detainees but is usually used by security along with beatings as a punishment method
